portfolio.paragraph1: It is my first SPA (Single Page Application) created 100% with JavaScript using the MERN Stack (Mongodb, Express, React & Node), it has some basic animations and it has responsive web design.
portfolio.paragraph2: It is a Discord bot that uses the Discord JS module from Node JS, which interacts with the Discord API, a totally modular structure was used thinking about the future growth of the bot.
portfolio.paragraph3: It is a script which collects data from a web page using the Node Puppeteer library, the data collected by the script is converted into XLSX format for storage.

contactme.title: Get in touch
